title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Perfection is often an illusion. Youre likely to be upset if you must correct or amend something that you previously saw as flawless. However, you dont want to revise too much, since any change requires extra time and resources. Youre willing to do whatever it takes today, but youre worried about the amount of effort involved. Your enthusiasm depends on what you see as the end goal. Concentrating on how your actions motivate others naturally lightens the burden of your work. Although youre laying the groundwork now, let the cosmos lend a helping hand. Character is revealed when pressure is applied. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
